control

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The player represents the object, which has to catch the different falling object. This object is controlled by the human player.
    Author:
    Dani

      • getMyPos

        public Position getMyPos()
        Returns:
        the myPosition

      • setMyPos

        public void setMyPos(Position NewPos)
        Parameters:
        NewPos - is set based on derivation of the movement of the player, and the players own blood alcohol ratio. The used method is based on the following equation: x = x + c*(sqrt(dx0^2+dx1^2))
